meanings.definition: A Sicilian dish consisting of eggplant, tomatoes, olives, and capers.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the flavorful caponata at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother makes the best caponata for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The caponata danced on my taste buds with its mix of vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The caponata was a symphony of flavors in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the caponata made it irresistible.

meanings.sent5: Caponataing the ingredients requires attention to detail.
